result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

records.addlTxt:
Def in custody w/Atty Geraldson
Motion & Order for Consolidation filed
CRT: DRI w/22CF84, 21CF473, 21CF646, 22CF335

State by Diaz (Tremp Co)) in person /  Def in custody in LCJ by video w/ Atty Geraldson in person
CRT:  this is set for plea
Def:  I want to get out.  I know there were some things that were agreed to
Diaz:  it was my understanding that as of yesterday & this morning, the matter was resolved.  I met w/ Mr Geraldson today & he stated def was not agreeing to terms of resolution
CRT:  I do not accept a No Contest plea unless there is an issue w/ restitution
11:09 Case Recalled - Atty Geraldson appears & CRT updates Atty Geraldson
Geraldson:  I was given offer yesterday from DA Sacia, she denies the charge of criminal damage...I have not had time to discuss a new resolution w/ other parties
Diaz:  resolution was from May.  Technologies not working as we like, comments on logistics & incorporating agreement into a settlement.  It is my understanding Geraldson will be contacting Sacia this afternoon
Geraldson comments on bond
Diaz:  given her history including BJ & history of not making appearances, she should remain in custody  - agreement is not for additional jail time
Geraldson:  req Sig bond due to amt of time def has been sitting, while released she maintained good communication w/ me, I am not aware of history of missing CRT
CRT:  Looking over prelim report, there were 5 missed appearances & 2 of them were in Feb.  There are 3 felony cases in Monroe Co.  If cases are not resolved by Mon., CRT will relook at bond
CRT:  Bond to remain as is
CRT:  Plea Hrg:  8-1-2022 @ 2:30 - Def to appear in person

State by Diaz (from Tremp Co) by video /  Def in custody in LCJ by video w/ Atty Geraldson by video
Diaz:  I rec'd message from ADA Sacia that there are some work that needs to be done on resolving issues.  Sacia made request to adjourn for a week or 2 so we could work w/ Geraldson
Geraldson:  nothing has been done for over a month.  DA did not appear for bond Hrg.  Minutes were sent to Mr Sacia indicating time lines for offer/diversion, I believe work needed to be done a week prior to Hrg & nothing has been done
CRT:  I kept Ms Sauer in jail so she would be here today & not incur new charges - I am concerned w/ progress of case
CRT:  Plea Hrg: 7-28-2022 @ 11am (this will overlap a couple of Hrgs).  If this is not resolved, CRT will dismiss case for lack of prosecution.  CRT will recycle zoom info
Plea hearing on July 28, 2022 at 11:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Kristen Mary Sauer
Current: N2685 Potato Ridge Rd, La Crosse, WI 54601 United States  (Effective: 02-21-2022)
Prior: N2683 Potato Ridge Road, La Crosse, WI 54601

State by Spec Pros Sacia  /  Def w/ Atty Joe Geraldson
Geraldson Waives Prelim Hrg - addresses warrants
Def:  no promises/threats
CRT finds Waiver is FVI
Probable cause found - boundover for trial
Information filed 
CRT:  Quash warrants - reinstate cash bond - covers both 22CF84 & 22CF93
Def stands mute - NG plea entered
Status:  4-7-2022 @ 10am in Br 3
Quashed in CRT per TWB - not entered in Visions

1:07 AM Defendant Kristen Mary Sauer not in court. Prosecuting Atty John Harrison Sacia appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Joseph Geraldson appeared by video means for Defendant Kristen Mary Sauer.
Parties by Zoom. 
State concerned that def is not present.  Requests warrant and bond forfeiture
CT:  Warrant - $2000
Cash bond forfeited
Cash bond of $500 posted in 22CF84 also covers this case

State by Sacia (Special Pros)  /  Def in custody w/ Atty Joe Geraldson
Hrg by Zoom
Copy of Complaint to Def
Cash bond required of $500 (covers 22CF84 & 22CF93) w/ conditions:  No Contact w/ T.P. or J.P. or their residence;  Refer to JSS for COMPAS;  Comply w/ JSS w/ testing
CRT orders JSS Compas & JSS to put together a Release Plan
Prelim Hrg:  2-11-2022 @ 11am in Br 3

Def in custody w/atty Geraldson
  Probable Cause Statement and Judicial Determination filed
Def became upset & was removed from the jail room before her hearing
